response.job_title: Senior estimator and cost control head en korner arquitectura y construcciones
response.summary:
Profesional en ingeniería civil,  magister en construcción con amplia experiencia en control de costos, elaboración de presupuestos y análisis financiero de proyectos. 

Como producto de mi formación y experiencia profesional, he adquirido destrezas y herramientas para la estructuración financiera y control presupuestal y de costos de proyectos de construcción.


La trayectoria profesional me ha permitido realizar análisis de presupuestos y control de costos con la finalidad de optimizar recursos y disminuir los costos pudiendo generar ahorros y estimar de forma oportuna el posible valor de cierre durante la construcción, de tal manera que la compañía pueda tomar las decisiones comerciales, jurídicas, financieras y técnicas pertinentes. Además de realizar un análisis y control con la finalidad de retroalimentar las áreas de planeación y presupuestos.
response.skills: Estimación de obras, Construcción de jardines, Leadership, Cost Management, Construction Management, Construction Planning, Construction Scheduling, Budgeting, Cost Control, Unit Costing, Project Estimation, Construcción, Elaboración de presupuestos, Microsoft Excel, AutoCAD Civil 3D, Microsoft Word, AutoCAD, Microsoft Office, Liderazgo, Trabajo en equipo

profile_positions.description:
-Appropriately evaluating the cost of differents project: residential, hotel, no residential, road and infrestruction project. Direct, indirect and finantial cost.
- Set-up and complete estimates in company standard estimating program. SINCO ERP.
-	Prepare preliminary and definitive construction schedules. Also, perform schedule control during construction
-	Estimate quantification and costing of general condition requirements, labour, and equipment, including productivities, material, and subtrade costs of the projects.
-	Accompany design criteria and recommend best options based on cost, engineering and construction process.
-	During the construction Project look for opportunities and cost savings.
- Prepare the pre-feasibility, identificating conceptual and budget costs using past project analytics, benchmarking, and historical data.
- the purchasing manager engaging in subcontractor post award scope clarification and negotiation. Looking for the best price, quality and scheule ejecution. - the purchasing area in the review of bidders, preparation of comparative tables and review of current market prices. In addition to providing technical support in reviewing the quantities of work for contracting.
-Estimation of the cashflow	
- Manage the control of direct and indirect costs of the construction in progress.
- Accompaniment in the structuring and coordination of residential, industrial, no residential and urban projects, through technical, cost and financial support.
profile_positions.title: Senior cost estimator and control manager

profile_positions.description:
- Monitoring, projection and cost control, accounting reconciliations, project closure and payroll flow control. Preparation of budgets for private tenders. Cost reports and management of the SINCO ERP program. hotels, no residential, residential projects
- During the construction Project look for opportunities and cost savings.
profile_positions.title: semi-senior cost controller for construction project

profile_positions.description: Monitoring, projection and control of costs, budgets and work programming, critical inputs (concrete, steel, masonry), contracting, payroll, warehouse, payments, investment flows, invoicing, alert of deviations (cost overruns and/or savings), reporting Management Management of the SINCO ERP Adpro program.
profile_positions.title: junior  cost controller for construction project

profile_positions.description: Market research, analysis of drawing, designs and construction process, quantities of building, preparation of technical specifications, estimation project, APU'S, crew analysis, salaries and nesting. For electrical, mechanical, hydraulic and plumbing networks, structure, security and control, and fire protection systems. For laboratoriy project and buildings (Office)
profile_positions.title: Junior Engineer

profile_positions.description: - Analysis, control, review and quantification of amounts of material from different kinds of project like residential and industrials project: building, mall, house and hotel.
profile_positions.title: Junior Engineer

profile_positions.description:
- Analysis, control, review and quantification of amounts of material from development of housing and building project.
- Support in the Development of Analysis of Unit Price from different projects around Colombia.
-Estimation of building project in differents cities in colombia
- Analysis of cost and budget from housing department. Helping every project that required any development of budget.
- Support to design department from the development of housing project.
- Review and observation of engineer design from houses project with reports to budget boss.
- Development of Analysis of Unit Price from different projects around Colombia.
- Support to infrastructure area to developed access road from housing project and budget for this road.
- Quantification of amounts of material from developed of housing and building project.
profile_positions.title: Junior Engineer

education.degree_name: Curso de preparacion para certificacion PMP

company.name: Korner Arquitectura & Construcción
company.description:
Construimos grandes proyectos inmobiliarios entregando en cada uno de ellos más de lo que se espera. Hacemos que nuestros proyectos se conviertan en realidades con dedicación y buen gusto, siempre apoyados por un equipo de trabajo comprometido.

Cada proyecto pensado y finalizado lo hacemos poniendo el alma. Desde adquirir predios, financiación propia y diseño innovador, hasta la construcción, administración y comercialización de íconos de ciudad que perduran y cumplen sueños.
